name: Dell iDRAC - Power Supply State Settings issue on {{powersupply.name}} with {{snmp_device.name}}
message:
{{#is_alert}}
{{powersupply.name}} state settings on {{snmp_device.name}} has an issue.

1 = Unknown
2 = Online (state disabled)
4 = not Ready
8 = Fan Failure
10 = Online and Fan Failure
16 = On
242 = Online and OK

{{/is_alert}} 

{{#is_alert_recovery}}
{{powersupply.name}} state settings issue resolved on {{snmp_device.name}}.

1 = Unknown
2 = Online (state disabled)
4 = not Ready
8 = Fan Failure
10 = Online and Fan Failure
16 = On
242 = Online and OK
{{/is_alert_recovery}}
